name: Progress
description: Visual progress indicator in linear or circular variants with determinate and indeterminate states

accessibility.screenReader: Uses role=progressbar with aria-valuenow, aria-valuemin, and aria-valuemax. Provides aria-valuetext for human-readable progress. Indeterminate state uses aria-busy. Accessible label can be provided.

recommendedUsage: Use to show completion status of operations. Use determinate variant when progress can be measured. Use indeterminate for unknown duration operations. Choose circular variant for compact spaces.
antiPatterns: Do not use for static percentages without context. Avoid using multiple indeterminate spinners in the same view. Consider Skeleton for content loading states.
